attributes.action: Remove Elizabeth Fry from the five pound note, and replace her with Nelson.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our currency should be used to celebrate the achievements of our history. It is my opinion that no representation of the strong military history of Great Britain is reproachable. Although Elizabeth Fry did a great deal for the state of Prisons in the United Kingdom, celebrating a hero from British History is important, and what greater naval hero is there than Nelson.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
